alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 10:03PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Newberry, central Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1000 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dreher Island State Park to 6 miles northeast of Batesburg-Leesville. Movement was east at 15 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Murray, Dreher Island State Park, Chapin, Lake Murray and vicinity. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 46 and 66. Interstate 26 between mile markers 87 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Murray, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
